Title: Provides for a stay on certain zoning board of appeals decisions upon the commencement of an article 78 proceeding against such board
Summary: Provides for a stay on certain zoning board of appeals decisions upon the commencement of an article 78 proceeding against such board.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, in relation to providing for a stay on certain zoning board of appeals decisions upon the commencement of an article 78 proceeding against such board
